**Summary**
• OpenAI’s new hiring platform uses AI to match candidates and businesses.
• Launches mid-2026, aiming to disrupt the job market with smarter connections.
• Could potentially dethrone LinkedIn as the go-to hiring spot.

Impact — OpenAI’s move signals a massive shift in how we find jobs and how companies recruit, leveraging AI for a more efficient and personalized experience.
